products.title: Day & Night Flecked Grey
products.metadescription: Day & night flecked grey
products.productdescription: Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind. Simply close or open the blind to move the strips to see out, or block yourself in. With their destinctive look, their day & night blinds don't just look amazing, but will also give you control over the light entering your room. The unique 2 layered fabric gives this blind a look like no other. Coming from the cassette down, around a bottom bar and back up is what makes this blind work.

products.title: Origin, Taupe Grey - Day Night Blind
products.metadescription: Origin, taupe grey - day night blind in a delicate stone shade, the origin taupe grey is subtle and unassuming. Its clean, contemporary fabric has a smooth, touchable texture and is double-layered to home netted strips that can be raised and lowered to al
products.productdescription: In a delicate stone shade, the origin taupe grey is subtle and unassuming. Its clean, contemporary fabric has a smooth, touchable texture and is double-layered to home netted strips that can be raised and lowered to allow more or less light into the room.Create an industrial look in a teenager's bedroom by hanging the taupe grey amidst cobalt blue or slate grey walls, perhaps including a brick-look wallpaper for a fun effect. Include steel and wire furnishings, adding warmth with antique-style wools and heavy linens.

products.title: Origin, Medium Grey - Day Night Blind
products.metadescription: Origin, medium grey - day night blind a contemporary shade of grey, the origin's medium grey is sleek and clean with an industrial edge. For complete versatility, the sliding strip of netting can be moved up and down to allow more or less light into the r
products.productdescription: A contemporary shade of grey, the origin's medium grey is sleek and clean with an industrial edge. For complete versatility, the sliding strip of netting can be moved up and down to allow more or less light into the room whilst still retaining privacy.Use the medium grey as part of a strong, moody dcor scheme in an older child's bedroom, framing it with stark white or pale grey walls. Add distinctive metallic furniture, in materials such as steel and wire, to add a real sense of style to the room. Provide colour with quick pops of petrol blue.

products.title: Luna Softshade Slate Grey Day and Night Blind
products.metadescription: Luna softshade slate grey day and night blind in grey. Made to measure from 28.61 with free uk mainland delivery. This day and night blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
This blind has a unique look that is sleek and stylish as well as highly practical for a modern living space. The luna softshade slate grey day and night roller blind can be easily adjusted to suit any time of day, the weather and your mood. It can be completely closed or open, or adjusted to the semi closed position with strips of voile between the solid slate grey fabric panels. This mode allows for an element of privacy with the benefit of natural light.
 
 Product id: db-vrbx1865 fabric colour: slate grey material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white brackets   control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er1 - lowest energy saving value - due to blind type or fabric light filtering: yes

products.title: Day & Night Brushed Steel
products.metadescription: The day & night brushed steel roller blind, with its textured dark grey design is both a practical and stylish blind. The gorgeous grey contrasts with the opaque stripes and gives this blind a unique feel. Combining brilliant light control with an
products.productdescription: The day & night brushed steel roller blind, with its textured dark grey design is both a practical and stylish blind. The gorgeous grey contrasts with the opaque stripes and gives this blind a unique feel. Combining brilliant light control with an aesthetic design, its a perfect addition to any window. Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind. Simply close or open the blind to move the strips to see out, or block yourself in. With their destinctive look, their day & night blinds don't just look amazing, but will also give you control over the light entering your room. The unique 2 layered fabric gives this blind a look like no other. Coming from the cassette down, around a bottom bar and back up is what makes this blind work. All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.Makeitsafe.Org.Uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with their roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.

products.productdescription: A gorgeous fusion of chocolate and cream threads, the magnum in taupe looks both natural and stylish. Of course, it's also amazingly practical, with versatile privacy and light control that can be easily adjusted to your will.Use the taupe in an all-white living room, where light and airiness are your top priorities. Fill the room with natural, naked woods, both light and medium, and organic fabrics such as hessian and wicker, finishing the room off with a woven jute rug.

products.title: Shine, Grey - Day Night Blind
products.metadescription: Shine, grey - day night blind for a silver that isn't a bold, modern metallic, go for the shine in grey, which displays a pale, shimmering tone that reflects the light and offers a subtle hint of glamour. The look is made streamlined by the hidden control
products.productdescription: For a silver that isn't a bold, modern metallic, go for the shine in grey, which displays a pale, shimmering tone that reflects the light and offers a subtle hint of glamour. The look is made streamlined by the hidden controls, which sit in the overhead rail cassette for usable functionality.Complement a bold navy colour scheme in the dining room by including the grey, which will look striking and impactful against a dark blue wall. Stick to navy and white for the key features in the room, using a matching subtle silver for fixtures, oddments, and trims.

products.title: Nightshade, Mist - Day Night Blind
products.metadescription: Nightshade, mist - day night blind in pale, silvery white, the nightshade in mist offers an opaque double layering of heavily stitched fabric, which plays host to the sliding strips of translucent netting. For an easy, streamlined effect, the controls are
products.productdescription: In pale, silvery white, the nightshade in mist offers an opaque double layering of heavily stitched fabric, which plays host to the sliding strips of translucent netting. For an easy, streamlined effect, the controls are neatly hidden from view in the blind's rail cassette, from which the blind hangs neatly and easily.Use the mist to complement a petrol blue and soft grey colour scheme in a contemporary living room, where it will look striking against a blue feature wall. Add furniture with modern finishes and clean lines, accenting with pale grey and white cushions and throws.

products.title: Origin, Grey - Vista Blind
products.metadescription: Origin, grey - vista blind origin grey brings a modern light stone grey into your home and combines it with the clean and clear lines that only a contemporary vista blind can provide. Finely woven and expertly crafted, no matter how discerning your eye is
products.productdescription: Origin grey brings a modern light stone grey into your home and combines it with the clean and clear lines that only a contemporary vista blind can provide. Finely woven and expertly crafted, no matter how discerning your eye is you are guaranteed to appreciate the workmanship that goes into every square inch.The ability to give your room the perfect light levels all day long makes your kitchen a fantastic choice for origin grey. By mixing the light stone grey fabric with distressed white worktops and lightly coloured shabby chic furnishing will give the centre of the home a modern and homely touch.

products.title: Origin, Taupe - Vista Blind
products.metadescription: Origin, taupe - vista blind a light beige fabric sits harmoniously below a matching voile to create the latest addition to their range of vista blinds. Lightweight and elegantly poised, every square inch is crafted with care to ensure that you add nothing b
products.productdescription: A light beige fabric sits harmoniously below a matching voile to create the latest addition to their range of vista blinds. Lightweight and elegantly poised, every square inch is crafted with care to ensure that you add nothing but understated luxury to your home.If you want to give your home a touch of rustic country with a modern twist there is no better addition to make to your home than origin taupe. The quality and colour of the fabric fit perfectly with beige and light sandy browns in your fabric choices. Add a matching throw and scatter cushions to the sofa and a cluster of tea lights to the sideboard to give your living room a relaxing vibe that lasts long into the evening.

products.title: Nightshade, Steel - Day Night Blind
products.metadescription: Nightshade, steel - day night blind in the nightshade steel, translucent netting is easily adjusted between double layered fabric to allow more or less privacy and light. The featured cloth is a tightly stitched silver affair, thicker than that of other r
products.productdescription: In the nightshade steel, translucent netting is easily adjusted between double layered fabric to allow more or less privacy and light. The featured cloth is a tightly stitched silver affair, thicker than that of other ranges to further protect from outside lights.Whilst the steel will match a range of colour schemes, it will look particularly striking amidst a navy and white colour scheme in a dining room. Go for painted white floorboards, navy throws, and matching silver cushions for a coordinated nautical effect.

products.title: Bayham, Taupe Grey - Vista Blind
products.metadescription: Bayham, taupe grey - vista blind bayham taupe grey allows you to add a unique modern touch to your home whilst combining it with a timeless colour that brings a classically calming presence to your decor. The lightweight voile hangs effortlessly as you ad
products.productdescription: Bayham taupe grey allows you to add a unique modern touch to your home whilst combining it with a timeless colour that brings a classically calming presence to your decor. The lightweight voile hangs effortlessly as you adjust the angle of the finely woven fabric to give the perfect light level for any occasion.We love the look of taupe grey in the kitchen or a cosy cottage style living room. Woods, slate, the fireplace, no matter what authentic style you decide to pair it with you are guaranteed to create a harmony with the existing decor whilst adding the modern touch of their unique vista style.

products.title: Natura, Mist - Vista Blind
products.metadescription: Natura, mist - vista blind natura mist combines a lightweight and elegant voile and a richly detailed fabric that immerses your senses to create a modern addition that adds to any home. With a level of craftsmanship and care that is unrivalled, the mist f
products.productdescription: Natura mist combines a lightweight and elegant voile and a richly detailed fabric that immerses your senses to create a modern addition that adds to any home. With a level of craftsmanship and care that is unrivalled, the mist fabric is integrated with the voile panels so that you have complete control of the light in your home. A unique blend of the aesthetic and functional worlds.Mist captures the imagination by taking your eye on a journey through a whole spectrum of colours and tones. Match the finely woven colour transitions with the intrinsic beauty of a wood floor or lightly stained kitchen worktop as you make a feature of the fine details.
